book.synopsis: Hired to exhume two-hundred-year-old graves in the wake of a land dispute, Anita Blake becomes involved in local murders involving three dead teenagers and a bloodless corpse that makes her suspect that an evil force is preying upon the town. Originally in paperback.
book.dimensions: Height: 9.12 Inches, Length: 6.36 Inches, Weight: 1.05 Pounds, Width: 1.19 Inches
